page.title: 08FINZEAN UNDER-5's CLUB.
page.content: We are called the{Under-5's Club}and we were formed in 1977.At present there are 16 members. We meet twice weekly, on Tuesday afternoon and Thursday morning.Our ages range from nought to five years. With help from our Mums we enjoy {playing with toys}in company with our friends.Older members like{painting, {making things with playdough or {creating models from bits of junk. In pleasant weather we sometimes{go {for walks or play in the football park where we have swings. During the summer there is an{outing {in a bus}to the beach or park and at Christmas we have{a party}to which Santa Claus comes , bringing us presents.
